channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: This rubbish is often left like this., 10th June
item.description:
This rubbish is left like this and there is constant flytipping here. This attracts rats and causes mess all across the streets. It’s unacceptable, every resident of the borough pays council tax yet we have rubbish everywhere but plenty of traffic wardens. Please sort this out asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Nutcroft Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish not collected from building, 10th June
item.description:
Our refuse waste bins have not been collected this week and are now overflowing. We are a small block of flats (Savana) on Yoakley Road.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Yoakley Road, Hackney, London

item.title: On my grass, 10th June
item.description:
This is a joke.my garden is a dogs mess we're thay can let there dogs run around and poo this is happening again and again

item.title: Broken, 10th June
item.description:

item.title: Dumped Untaxed Motor Vehicle, 10th June
item.description:
This car has been dumped in road for months by a non resident,and needs to be removed as soon as possible!!!! its non taxed and would cause emergency vehicles a problem who were attempting to attend residential houses in our small close being that it can’t be moved !!!! This isn’t the first time that someone has decided to use this road as a dumping ground .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Lochmere Close, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wood dumped by side of fence in car park bay, 10th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Duddington Close, Elmstead, London

item.title: Abandoned household items again., 10th June
item.description:
This is ridiculous that owners or landlords can leave the entire contents of an apartment on the street. The Council must take action as this is unsightly, dangerous and will encourage vermin.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southgate Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Discarded drinks cans once again dumped in Rowley Gardens N4, on the grass near The Finsbury pub., 10th June
item.description:
This problem is ongoing. Previous job reference 7617353. The cans are cleared, by the estate cleaner? Then the drinker comes back on an evening and leaves more cans.Perhaps you need to send someone in the evening to tell the drinker to desist.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: External Blocked drain in a council property, 10th June
item.description:
Blocked drain from neighbours council owned property overflowing onto our property, damaging our walkway and causing very bad smell. The occupant has said that she raised the issue with the council previously but it wasn't resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parkfield Way, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
